data.title: Delaware Shore Properties
data.text:
Lewes Delaware Real Estate has much to offer for the interested homebuyer. Lewes is a historic coastal community with beautiful scenery of where the Delaware Bay and Atlantic Ocean meet at Cape Henlopen. Located just north of Rehoboth, you will be able to settle right in to one of the many tight-knit, low key communities in and around the historical Lewes area. As a part of Cape Henlopen State Park, the beaches are accompanied by campgrounds, nature trails, and tons of historical sites to view, including the WW2 watch tower, Fort Miles. The State Park also offers many water activities such as swimming, surfing, fishing, boating, surf fishing, paddleboarding, etc.

Tax-free Lewes Delaware also offers many elaborate shops and boutiques such as antique and collectibles stores, art galleries, interior design stores, outlets, and toy stores for the kids! Lewes also has many well known fine dining restaurants and pubs including Irish Eyes Pub and Restaurant, The Surfing Crab, Tokyo Steakhouse, The Buttery, The Wharf Restaurant and Bar, Rose and Crown, Striper Bites and so much more!

Lewes Delaware is the home of the historical Cape-May Lewes Ferry. The ferry provides daily car and passenger ferry service from Cape May to New Jersey. It is an enjoyable experience for all ages. As you cross the Delaware Bay, enjoy historic lighthouses, scenic harbors, unique shorebirds and maybe even your own dolphin escort!

Overlooking the Lewes-Rehoboth Canal is 1812 Memorial Park, filled with historic ships and gorgeous views along the docks. There are many family friendly parks, such as the Canalfront Park & Marina where you and your family can enjoy the many activities that are held there. Those activities include boat parades, outdoor movies, and performances, but there are also so many more things you can look forward to. Condos along the canal allow you to sit on the balconies and watch the boats peacefully sail in and out of the harbor. Lewes is the perfect place for either year-round living or a quiet summer getaway. You'll feel a part of the community almost immediately when you settle into your property in beautiful Lewes, Delaware.

For most, that is enough of an incentive to live in Delaware, but when you add to the equation that there is no sales tax, no inheritance tax, and no Social Security tax, it is nearly impossible to find a better or more recommended place to live.

Delaware Shore Properties will be sure to make your Lewes Delaware Real Estate shopping experience as easy and efficient as possible. You are guaranteed that you will be able to find the perfect match to your desired dream home with all that Lewes has to offer! Whether you long for white sandy beaches, tall exquisite condos, or dark green front lawns, you will be able to find your preferred property here with us! Satisfy your lifestyle preference in our various listings for Lewes, Delaware.

Call Matt Brittingham for more detailed information on our selection of Lewes Delaware Real Estate.
